achievements.name: Land of Fertility: Runaway Saurians
achievements.desc: Light up the Atocpan map in the Natlan region.

achievements.name: Rendezvous With Ruin
achievements.desc: Light up the Ancient Sacred Mountain map in the Natlan region.

achievements.name: Sacred Mountain Guide
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the following areas in Natlan: Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Plain of Fertile Ash
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following area in Natlan: Atocpan.

achievements.name: Offerings to the Night: Plain of Fertile Ash
achievements.desc: Unlock all the seals on the secret spaces of the tribes in the following area in Natlan: Atocpan.

achievements.name: Votre Toast, Je Peux Vous Le Rendre
achievements.desc: Follow 3 Matador Monetoo and complete the graffiti in Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Votre Toast, Je Peux Vous Le Rendre
achievements.desc: Follow 6 Matador Monetoo and complete the graffiti in Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Votre Toast, Je Peux Vous Le Rendre
achievements.desc: Follow 9 Matador Monetoo and complete the graffiti in Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Fertile Ash Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 40 chests in Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Fertile Ash Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 80 chests in Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Fertile Ash Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 160 chests in Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Fertile Ash Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 3 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Fertile Ash Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 6 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Fertile Ash Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 9 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Ancient Sacred Mountain and Atocpan.

achievements.name: Flowers for Someone
achievements.desc: Perhaps, compared to the world that was within its grasp, there is something else that matters more.
